attributes.action: Legalisation in UK for Gay Marriages
attributes.additional_details:
A marriage is a bond of love betweeen two people not God. This is the 21st Century and the element of God does not remain in a marriage as it did hundreds of years ago. It should not matter if it is a man or a woman the element of commitment is still there.

It is a commitment to one another for the rest of your lifes. The Universal Declaration of Rights states everyone is equal in the right to marriage.

Same sex couples should be allowed to marry and have their marriage viewed the same as a hetrosexual couples.
